plot: Hopper and Finch are paired together following job applications submitted to a man only known as 'Clarke.' Season 1 follows the jobs they pull as part of the audition.
plot_en: Hopper and Finch are paired together following job applications submitted to a man only known as 'Clarke.' Season 1 follows the jobs they pull as part of the audition.
plot_es: Hopper and Finch are paired together following job applications submitted to a man only known as 'Clarke.' Season 1 follows the jobs they pull as part of the audition.
title: Hopper and Finch
